movie_title: Why are prices going up? 6 Minute English
introduction: Around the world, prices of things are rising more than normal, and more worrying is that prices kee

vocabulary.definition: the increase in prices of things over time
vocabulary.example: The inflation rate in the country reached 5% last year.
The stock market is known to be volatile, with prices fluctuating rapidly.

vocabulary.definition: continuing at the same level for a long period of time
vocabulary.example: The company enjoyed sustained growth over the past decade.

vocabulary.definition: works well and gets the best results
vocabulary.example: Regular exercise is an effective way to improve overall health.

vocabulary.definition: an extremely high and typically accelerating inflation
vocabulary.example: During the economic crisis, the country experienced hyperinflation of over 1,000,000%.

vocabulary.definition: a situation where a country’s production decreases, incomes drop, and unemployment rises
vocabulary.example: The recession in 2008 had long-lasting effects on the global economy.
